cases.name: Smith
accomplishments: Trained and mentored 300 students in the 0300 common skills package for class 11-13.
Served as Platoon Commander for Weapons Platoon and Mortar Section Lead Instructor for class 11-13.
Trained and mentored six new combat instructors during their first training cycle, ensuring a smooth transition and improving overall performance within the unit.
Trained, mentored, and produced 28 entry level students in becoming and 0341 basic infantry mortarman.

Served as position safety officer during eight live fire training events ensuring safe and effective training for over 280 student Marines training on M16A4, M203, AT-4 and LAW  trainers, 60mm and 81mm mortars, and live fire and movement.
Planned and supervised three live fire training events for the 60mm mortar and 81mm mortar systems, training and qualifying 28 students on those weapons systems.
Achieved a platoon GPA of 98.86 for the 0341 mortarman class.
